settings.subtitle: From the world's largest 18V cordless range to the next-generation XGT 40V Max platform, Makita has been engineering professional power tools since 1915. Invicta Tools is your authorised Makita dealer in Kent.

settings.title: Over a Century of Power Tool Innovation
settings.paragraph_1: Founded in 1915 in Anjo, Japan, Makita began as an electric motor repair company before revolutionising the power tool industry. Today, Makita operates 10 manufacturing plants across 8 countries and sells in over 40 nations worldwide.
settings.paragraph_2: Makita's LXT 18V platform is the world's largest cordless tool system with over 350 products — from impact drivers and circular saws to garden tools and vacuums. The newer XGT 40V Max platform delivers corded power without the cord, while CXT 12V Max offers compact solutions for lighter tasks.

settings.title: Construction & Building
settings.description: From first fix to finishing, Makita's cordless range covers every stage. Impact drivers, circular saws, plunge saws, and reciprocating saws built for all-day site use.

settings.title: Joinery & Carpentry
settings.description: Precision routers, planers, biscuit joiners, and sanders. Makita's brushless motors deliver consistent power and longer runtime for workshop and on-site joinery.

settings.title: Metalworking & Fabrication
settings.description: Angle grinders from 115mm to 230mm, cut-off saws, and metal shears. The XGT 40V Max platform delivers the power for heavy-duty metalwork previously reserved for corded tools.

settings.title: Garden & Landscaping
settings.description: Cordless lawn mowers, hedge trimmers, chainsaws, leaf blowers, and strimmers. One battery system powers your entire garden toolkit — no petrol, no fumes, no hassle.

settings.title: Electrical & Plumbing
settings.description: Compact CXT 12V Max drill drivers, impact drivers, and multi-tools for tight spaces. Plus pipe cutters, press tools, and threading machines for plumbing professionals.
